scripts.build-all-w: powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path ./packages/components -Directory | ForEach-Object {cd $_.FullName; npm i; npm run build; cd ../..}"
scripts.build-all-l: for d in ./packages/components/*/; do (cd "$d" && npm install && npm run build); done
scripts.dev-web: npm run build-all-w && npm run dev-d
